description: No Ramp Night - OSL Drinking Party Background As Hong Kong solidifies its role as a leading global hub for digital assets, the friction between traditional finance (TradFi) and the Web3 economy is rapidly disolving. "No Ramp" embodies the next-generation financial infrastructure where the distinction between on-ramps and off-ramps evolves into seamless, programmable, and compliant value transfer. Alongside Consensus Hong Kong 2026, OSL Group will host the "No Ramp Night HK". As Asia's leading stablecoin payment and trading platform, OSL will leverage its compliance leadership and global network to convene key partners across banking, custody, blockchain infrastructure, and institutional finance, exploring the future of payments, stablecoins, compliant finance, and borderless digital economy. Highlights 1 Invite-only access 2 Trend Analysis 3 Local empowerment 4 Premium networking Agenda 19:00-19:20 Registration 19:20-19:35 Opening Speech 19:35-23:00 Drinking Party & Networking Reception No Ramp Night - OSL Web3 No Ramp- Consensus Hong Kong 2026 OSL No Ramp Night HK OSL OSL 1 2 3 4 Agenda 19:00-19:20 19:20-19:35 19:35-23:00 &
